mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName

select phd.no ,phd.aptCode ,phd.dealAmount ,phd.dealYear ,phd.dealMonth ,phd.dealDay ,phd.area ,phd.floor
,hi.aptName ,dc.dongCode ,dc.dongName ,phi.roadName ,phi.roadNamebonbun
from houseinfo hi join dongCode dc on hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode join phouseinfo phi on hi.dongCode = phi.dongCode and hi.aptName = phi.apartmentName join phousedeal phd on phi.aptCode = phd.aptCode where hi.aptCode = #{aptCode} order by phd.dealYear, phd.dealDay
select name, type, maxlevel from searchlist where name like CONCAT('%',#{inputMsg}, '%') order by FIELD(type, "시", "구군", "동","아파트명");

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where left(h.dongcode,5) = left(#{gugun},5) order by aptName limit 10;

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) where left(h.dongcode,2) = left(#{sido},2) order by aptName limit 500;
